ValidationRule.description: Values can only be selected against a cancelled status record
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Division__c , "VPS"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Closed_Reason__c , "Cancelled")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Reason_for_Cancelling__c , "")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only select a cancellation reason when lead status is cancelled
